name: 100% AAA Grade Roasted Arabica Coffee Beans
description:
• Savour the full-bodied flavours of our AAA-Grade 100% Arabica beans grown in the picturesque hills of the Bababudangiri Range of Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka. Our estate-grown Arabica beans are of superior quality, cultivated in the shade of native vegetation and fruit trees at elevations of 4500 to 5000 feet. 
  • FLAVOUR NOTES: Long-lasting, pleasant taste with a delicate flavour and a balanced aroma. 
  • Our 1 kg and 5 kg offerings are ideal for stocking up your office pantry or for coffee machines at any food retail outlet. 
  • SHELF LIFE: 12 months from the date of manufacture
